haikus: [ [//I like this Tumbling waves below, The cliff's edge looms dangerously, Courage fuels my step ], [1 The path less traveled, Few dare to brave the danger, But I am fearless ], [//Like it As I reach the top, I feel a sense of oneness, With sky and heaven ], [2 At the trail's start point, The horizon beckons me, A new adventure awaits ], [3 Silent mountain top, Overwhelming awe and peace, All else fades away ] ]
